title: Did an 8-Year-Old Yemeni Child Bride Die of Internal Injuries?
subtitle: An eight-year-old Yemeni girl reportedly died of internal bleeding on her wedding night after marrying a man five times her age.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An 8-year-old Yemeni girl was forced to marry a 40-year-old man and then died of vaginal injuries on their wedding night.
